title: How do respiratory systems and circulatory systems work together? - Quora

response.answer_text: The respiratory system (lungs) discharge oxygen into the blood, and extract carbonic acid that is formed by the life functions. Heart rate is increased when body needs more oxygen. The breathe signal is sent to the lungs (rather, the muscles of breathing at diaphragm, chest, shoulders and neck) when increased acidity of blood (due to carbonic acid) is detected by the brainstem.
